properties.Name: CancellationReason
properties.Description:
When an insurance company cancels a policy and when it chooses not to renew it. Insurance companies cannot cancel a policy that has been in force for more than 60 days except:

Cancellation reasons include:

- Failure to pay premium
- Fraudulent Activity
- Misrepresentation on application
- Suspended/revoked drivers license
- Company did not renew

Columns.Name: CancellationReasonId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the cancellation reason.

Columns.Name: CancellationReasonName
Columns.Description: The name of the cancellation reason.

Columns.Name: CancellationReasonDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the cancellation reason.
